Dublador em, inglês: Douglas Rye ( Castlevania: Curse of Darkness ) Patrick Seitz ( Castlevania The Dracula X Chronicles, Castlevania: Order of Ecclesia, Castlevania Judgment ) Robert Carlyle ( Castlevania: Lords of Shadow , Castlevania: Lords of Shadow – Mirror of Fate ), Castlevania: Lords of Shadow 2 )
Dublador, japonês: Norio Wakamoto, Nobuhiko Kazama (como Mathias), Mahito Ooba, Hiroya Ishimaru, Jouji Nakata.
